vecHighlight.strDescription: Install 8 boosters in a single Bionic Duplicant.
Successfully analyze at least one seed of all mutatable plants.
Uncover the past to secure your future by fulfilling the requirements of the Exploration Imperative.
Have all Duplicants in a rocket survive in space for 10 cycles in a row with a morale of 25 or higher.
Have radbolts travel a cumulative 10 km.
Run a Research Reactor at full capacity for 5 cycles.
Extract Uranium from a Beeta hive without getting stung.
Ensure your colony's legacy by fulfilling the requirements of the Escape Imperative.
Establish your permanent home by fulfilling the requirements of the Colonize Imperative.
Land dupes or rovers on all worlds in the cluster.
Teleport a Duplicant and defrost a Friend on another world.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Escape extinction by fulfilling the requirements of the Defense Imperative.
Secure your colony's industrial future by fulfilling the Power Imperative.
Produce a Data Bank using a Data Miner operating at maximum efficiency.

vecUnachieved.strName: The Lab: Life Found A Way
vecUnachieved.strDescription: Survive 100 cycles after Demolior collides with your colony.

data.strFullDescription:
In the space-colony simulation game [i]Oxygen Not Included[/i] you’ll find that scarcities of oxygen, warmth and sustenance are constant threats to your colony's survival. Guide colonists through the perils of subterranean asteroid living and watch as their population grows until they're not simply surviving, but [i]thriving... [/i]

[b]Just make sure you don't forget to breathe.[/b]

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/2e982206c85f15c11db0a9c1b55f7dee.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/2e982206c85f15c11db0a9c1b55f7dee.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Build Extensive Bases and Discover What it Takes to Survive:[/h2]
Everything in your space colony is under your control, from excavation and resource allocation right down to plumbing and power systems. Resources will begin depleting with your first breath, however, so be sure to dig fast if you want to live.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/6c4e9639b2625789ac8fba46b91510c9.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/6c4e9639b2625789ac8fba46b91510c9.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
It’s Mind Over Matter with Stress Simulations:[/h2]
Keep the psychological impact of survival at bay with fun leisure activities, great accommodations and even better food for your colony. Duplicants each have different and potentially destructive ways of reacting to stress, so be sure to always keep them happy. Whatever the cost.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/5b2548a0e7d8a0d3e16b5faa1b6ae9bc.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/5b2548a0e7d8a0d3e16b5faa1b6ae9bc.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Avoid Boiling with Thermodynamics:[/h2]
Temperature control is a constant concern in space; too cold and you'll freeze, too hot and you'll fry. Keep tabs on ambient environmental temperatures and your colony's heat production to maintain a nice, cozy atmosphere for your colonists.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/fbabb06dde07787d54c3abaa0e58182e.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/fbabb06dde07787d54c3abaa0e58182e.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Enhance Efficiency through Complex Gas and Liquid Simulations:[/h2]
Create interlocking pipe systems to swiftly deliver fuel and liquid to critical areas of your base. Plan well and be rewarded as your colony transforms into an imperishable, well-oiled machine.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/328280c87175819cfd942abc0c8297d2.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/328280c87175819cfd942abc0c8297d2.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Take Charge with Power Grid Simulations:[/h2]
Choose from a multitude of power sources including coal, hydrogen, natural gas or just plain old elbow grease. Manage power runoff, circuit overloads and meltdowns to keep your colony running smoothly.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/689e603cc3a92896ccf16cc2157b898d.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/689e603cc3a92896ccf16cc2157b898d.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Always Keep Yourself Breathing:[/h2]
Enter the Oxygen Overlay and watch air moving through your base in real time. Monitor carbon dioxide accumulation and oversee oxygen generation processes to mold your colony into a veritable deep-space oasis.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/1fcd54474f7c65d24c0c6b40ccbb6e65.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/1fcd54474f7c65d24c0c6b40ccbb6e65.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Waste Nothing through Extreme Recycling:[/h2]
Make use of every last resource for a base that truly exemplifies efficiency. Recycle waste into precious fuel, process unbreathable gas into air or harness the natural bodily processes of wild creatures for food. If you’re clever, you might even be able to run a base off colonist farts.

[h2][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/f64503a1dc91bc187d4d9113ed3acafb.poster.avif?t=1750118450" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/f64503a1dc91bc187d4d9113ed3acafb.webm?t=1750118450" width="600" height="150"][/imgvid]
Explore Diverse, Procedurally Generated New Worlds:[/h2]
Summon new worlds with a push of a button. Experience tons of untamed space rocks, then suffocate to death in them!
[img width="596" height="10"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/42f09af30130250fda342551860c59cb.webp?t=1750118450[/img]
data.strSnippet: Oxygen Not Included is a space-colony simulation game. Deep inside an alien space rock your industrious crew will need to master science, overcome strange new lifeforms, and harness incredible space tech to survive, and possibly, thrive.
